item.title: Building A Hugo Website
item.description: Why am I using hugo This website is a static site built using hugo. I made the decision to go with this approach after spending about 10 mins using the free wordpress.com blogging platform. I found the editor a nightmare and it felt like my entire experience would be about trying to make it look good rather than focusing on content. I wanted something that looked and felt more like Jonathon Hodgson’s site: minimalist in style and content focused.
